article: Mr. Smith lived in a village. He had  a few  farms and about twenty people working for him. He often told them  to work  hard and be honest. One day he went to a farm and worked with the workers there. Soon it was time  _  lunch. He put some nice bread on the table and went out. A few minutes later, he came back again but he couldn't find the  _  . "Who  _  the bread on the table?" he shouted. Some of the workers answered, "We  _  ." The others said, "We saw nothing." "Well," said Mr. Smith, "There are a lot of mice in the rooms, you know. So I put some poison in the bread. If they eat, they will  _  . Then I can kill them." As soon as he finished, four workers began to cry. "Oh, dear!" "  What's wrong with you  ?" asked Mr. Smith. "We ate the bread when you  _  out. We are going to die." One of them cried. "Don't worry," Mr. Smith said  _  a smile. "I only play a trick on you."
